Name: Wandering Tales Travel Dreams
Title: Peaceful Temple
Review: Very peaceful place to visit close to KBR Park.  There is parking available onsite which makes it easier for people visiting in cars.  Just make sure you check the timings before you go as they may change according to the season.

Name: Xavier D
Title: Jagannath temple
Review: Very nice temple and a good place to visit with your family. Not much rush as well compared to the other places.

Name: Priya_SM
Title: Beautiful replica of Jagannath temple with a wonderful vibe
Review: It's a beautiful replica of the Puri Jagannath temple and has an extremely positive vibe to it. We visited on a Sunday morning, so the temple was a little crowded but not overly so. Very peaceful and calming place - must visit if you're in Banjara Hills.

Name: Bunny
Title: Good place to visit with family & friends.
Review: Looks exactly as the Jagannath temple from orissa. Beautiful and amazing place to visit in friends or family members. The temple has lord Krishna,Balaram & subadra in the main complex surrounded by other diets temples like lord Hanuman, lord Ganesha and goddess temple. You can also find beautiful craftings of Lord vishnu avatra on the walls.We visit in the morning at the time of sunrise, the temple looked fantastic.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: Must visit to see wall murals in Shri Jagannath Temple
Review: Jagannath temple in Hyderabad. Not frequented by tourists but famous with locals. Some parking space. No ticket required. Very good murals on the wall that depict many Hindu mythological stories.

Name: Venkat
Title: Speech less experience
Review: This temple is just a replica of Puri jagannath temple,  it's very nice,  book white cabs in hyderabad to visit this temple from any where in hyderabad

Name: Mayank G
Title: Superbly Designed Temple and Nice Ambiance.
Review: It was superbly designed Temple and Nice Ambiance. One of the good place to visit with family so see here well constructed temple .

Name: rajans307
Title: Nice temple to visit
Review: Nestled in the middle of the city, very nice Jaganath temple feel..Very Beautiful. Must visit places

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Let None Miss It
Review: Sri Jagannath temple, situated at Road No. 12, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad, is dedicated to Lord Jagannath. meaning Lord of Universe. This temple is said to have been constructed by Odiya Community. This temple is constructed with Sandstone and appears in Red color. Moreover, this is said to be the Replica of the Original Lord Jagannath temple at Puri. Within the premises, there are five temples but the main Sanctum Sanctorum houses Lord Jagannath along with his siblings, Lord Balabhadra and Devi Subhadra.Parking is very much available and the great time to visit is in the evenings where the Temple has a beautiful view and the ambiance is so great.A must visit temple for all in the city of Hyderabad  and Secunderabad.

Name: Tanyaindu
Title: Very good temple.
Review: It is a replica of Puri temple situated near Banjara hills. Very well maintained. The ambience is wood coloured and premises are well  maintained.

Name: Lalz
Title: Magnificent and serene.
Review: Went here for my mom's birthday. I swear to god, no place has ever made me feel so calm and relaxed. The aarti is divine and the architecture is splendid. The premises are so well maintained. Easy to get here too. Just take the metro and you'll get here. I've heard that in the evening, the temple is a sight to behold. Would love to visit again.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Beautiful temple complex
Review: This beautiful and well maintained temple is located close to KBR National Park and we had visited the same during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. This is a temple complex with many small temples dedicated to Lord Ganesha, Lord Shiva, 9 Planet surrounding the big main temple which is dedicated to Lord Jagannath. There are colorful sculptures on the wall of the temple complex depicting events from the life of Lord Krishna. We liked the beautiful Orissa style temple architecture with intricate carvings on the walls and the ambiance inside the complex.

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: Very nice place
Review: The place was very nice. Good for devotional visit. Nice place to visit with family. nice experience

Name: Mutukuloju Pranay
Title: Prefect Architecture
Review: Replicate of Jagannath temple , Odisha much similar. they do best festivals like Ratha yatra on the month of august or September, you can have great experience

Name: Govind Dev
Title: Such a Beautiful Temple
Review: One of the  Beautiful temple in the Hyderabad. it just similar to same puri jagannath temple in odisha. Very good sculpture to see here. It is a good devotional place to visit

Name: Jsanku123
Title: Great Place for higher consciousness.
Review: Replica of Puri Temple.There is a light and sound show during evenings and cultural programs like dance and drama.

Name: shailesh154
Title: Beautiful temple in beautiful surrounding
Review: Great to perform puja of all kinds. Performed navgraha abhishek  pooja on the occasion of my daughter's birthday. Very beautiful architecture

Name: Jajabor
Title: Full Puri feels
Review: This temple is situated in a very easy-to-spot location surrounded by modern structures all around, making the temple architecture stand out like an oasis in the middle. Beautiful at night as well....must visit even if you are an atheist.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Soothing Spiritual experience
Review: This is the most well maintained and cleanest temple in Hyderabad. The temple opens from 6 am to 12 noon in morning and from 5 pm to 9 pm in evening. The morning arti happens at 11 am. Splendid architecture, it has close resemblance to the temple at Puri. There are five other temples within the complex. On Sat and Sun there is a beautiful light and sound show at 8pm. Tickets can be bought in advance. On Sat and Sun they also serve prasad and dinner to devotees on payment of a small token fee

Name: anandrai
Title: This is a traditional Shri Jagannath Temple with ample space and nice ambiance
Review: You will find daily aarti and prasadam and on special occasions the temple gets beautifully decorated. The parking space is limited so keep that in mind.

Name: shilpi j
Title: Jagannath temple
Review: The temple is a copy of Jagannath temple of orissa. While entering the temple you feel devine and your mind calms down. No long queue are there if you visit avoiding speciay days. There is prasad which you can buy if you wish to. Nice and good place to spend some time in the grace of god.

Name: Sudipta C
Title: A serene and peaceful place
Review: We went with family. It's a huge place and very nicely maintained. Very clean. Every one should visit this place.

Name: sree143in
Title: Good Place
Review: Shri jagannath tempel in banjara hills very nice one in hyderabad. a good place for all to visit at any time.

Name: ShankarTravelores
Title: A replica of Puri Jagannath.
Review: Elders who cannot travel the distance of Puri (Orissa), this is just the place they could reach out and have the feel and soul of Lord Jagannath. On the learning front....can make children understand the difference between the styles of construction between the South India and the rest of India.

Name: authordevika
Title: Peaceful bliss
Review: If you visit Orissa, visiting the Jagannath Temple should feature in your itinerary. You will have a peaceful experience after the Darshan at the temple. Recommend to take an official pandit (priest) of the OTDC hotel as there are many thugs.

Name: MukeshDave
Title: Nice temple
Review: Very nice temple of Lord Krishna. This looks very much like Puri temple and I happened to visit immediately after puri.

Name: Jo-Ann
Title: Beautiful
Review: Just by the main road. Not easy to miss as its architecture is superb. Parking is crazy there too. Quite an interesting visit.

Name: Suddhasattwa M
Title: Evening Aarti
Review: Very good place to sit and meditate. It is well maintained.The temple is in Jubilee Hills area and is on the main road.

Name: Sunil
Title: Jagannath temple
Review: The place is really very good and the place is so peaceful and people and children will enjoy this place and the temple is so peaceful and I see they teach odisi dance

Name: BhaskarVVB
Title: Great replica of the Lord Jagannath temple of Puri
Review: This is a very serene place on a heavily busy street. Visited this temple multiple times over the years. I like going back and visiting at every available opportunity. There's another similar Jagannath temple near ORR near IDA Bolarum Hyderabad which is equally worthwhile visiting.Being born in Odisha, I get a lot of solace going back to this place and similar ones.This temple hosted a Durga Puja pandal called Kalinga, unfortunately I couldn't visit this time around.Shubho Bijaya!

Name: ravitaruna
Title: Ravi
Review: It is one of the best place if some one wants to make cool trip of business visits at Hydrabad IT I dustries and earn holy  feelings with such a calm and cool pla e.People at temple are highly cooperative but you need to be little conscious while visiting local places.

Name: futuregenie
Title: A peaceful place in that busy environment
Review: A peaceful place in that busy environment. 6 temples are there & all 6 temples are beautifully decorated and also clean . Good parking area for both cars and two wheelers . you will find one good shoes keeping center also. Prasadam is very nice. We bought two varieties and both are excellent. Each packet cost is less than 100Rs. .  Overall very good experience. Don't forget to seat for sometimes there.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Nice Temple
Review: This Jagannath Temple is located in Banjara Hills area. widely spreaded. Peaceful and divine atmosphere. Neat and clean temple area. make a visit.

Name: sirisha k
Title: Peaceful and spacious Temple
Review: Peaceful and spacious temple , located in the heart of the city, ample car parking, clean and neat, u can have darshan of lord jagannath and other Gods also.

Name: Hamad
Title: Auspicious Jaganath Temple
Review: One of the most beautiful and peaceful temple in Hyderabad of Lord Jaganath. The temple environment is clean, quite & peaceful. They have nice meals as well for cheap price. The temple is highly decorated during Rath Yatra.

Name: Gaurav G
Title: Very good place, Mostly quite. Just noisy during prayers due to bells ringing
Review: Very good temple. Peace and calm. Visited here with family and offered my prayers. although the bell ringing makes a lot of noise but it really helps remove all the distracting thoughts from your mind and allows you to calm down.

Name: Devesh P
Title: Beautiful Temple - Very Peaceful too
Review: Visited Shri Jagannath Temple - Very well maintained temple in am excellent location for both locals and tourists. Open till 8 PM in the evening and ample parking space provided. Best time to visit would be morning or late evening after sunset since there are six smaller deity temples within. The murals work on the walls are beautiful and artistic. The temple architecture is unique to that as temples in orissa.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Replica of Jagannath temple Puri
Review: Shri Jagannath temple situated near KBR Park in Hyderabad is a replica of the famous Jagannath temple Puri.While it is built beautifully but still it cannot replace the beauty of the original temple.

Name: vinod
Title: Lemon tree hotel review
Review: The hotel is good and provides excellent support and services. The hired staff, food quality is too good.

Name: RajaSekar M
Title: Sri Jagannadh Temple- Good to visit in the evening
Review: Sri Jagannadh temple is good and clean. Only thing which is of more concern is that tiles are too hot in mid day time. Had very difficult in placing the foot on floormat(small width). Only one person can use. If other person comes opposite, one has to step aside from it.Darshan was good and had happy time. Very peaceful place. Temple Prasad are not worth for money.

Name: Jayashree D
Title: Get satisfaction of visiting original JAagannathpuri Temple.
Review: If you don't have time to visit Jagannathpuri & you are in Hyderabad, Do visit this temple. Just same as original Murtis.

Name: KP Ram
Title: good place to get peace.
Review: good place to get peace. beautiful architexture. Aarti @ 6.15pm superb. Jagannath Aarti. must visit place.

Name: Jason K
Title: Impressive architecture
Review: This temple looks very impressive and is in fact a replica of the Puri Jagannath Temple in Odisha. Colorful carvings adorn the walls. Shoes are forbidden to be worn inside the temple. A half hour visit was sufficient for us to explore and take photos.

Name: RajeshKota
Title: Jai Jagannath!!
Review: A great replica of Puri Jagannath temple. A very serene atmosphere to be at where a lot of artistic views give wonderful experience..

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Mini puri temple
Review: A mini replica of puri jaganath temple with great upkeep and a flow of oriya traditions,  great temple to be at Hyderabad

Name: DeeTalwar
Title: Good Temple
Review: Recently, I have visited this temple of Lord Jagannath with my family and it's really good temple. They have a Parking place just in front of entry gate to temple, but that is limited to few number of cars. I was lucky that when we visited one car was doing exit, so I get a parking just in front of the entry gate of Temple.

Name: Arun
Title: highly spiritual
Review: excellent piece of architect & very clean beautiful  temple with peaceful location. had blessing of god

Name: Ravi M
Title: Serene and beautiful.
Review: I have not been to the Jagannath Temple in Odisha but feel that I may not have missed much. This replica of the original Jgannath Temple is so well copied to the tee.Beatiful architecture, and spotlessly clean, it impressed me for its serenity and pious feel. A must visit for all and highly recommended.

Name: Balasubramanian
Title: Exact replica of puri Jagannath temple
Review: Go in the evenings before sunset , that way you will enjoy the natural daylight view and evening lightings in the temple as well.Don't miss the murals on the walls, you can teach the children the history of Vishnu avatar.There are stalls that serve Prasad for a price, worth it.Easily you will end up spending 1.5 hrs to 2 hrs.

Name: Murthy TVR
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Built on a big chunk of land with ample parking right in the heart of the city.A must see will be after sunset. Gives Immanence pleasure and treat to eye.

Name: 30tv
Title: Temple, a must visit place
Review: Very nice, beautiful and very well maintained temple. Must visit place if you have time, located at Banjara hills.

Name: HithaPrasad
Title: Nice temple
Review: It’s a well maintained, spacious temple. Beautiful architecture. Can sit and spend some time inside the temple campus.

Name: payal
Title: Cultural Beauty
Review: A beautiful temple built at hill area of the pearl City - Banjara hills..it's almost similar to the actual lord Jagannath'stemple in Orissa...I really like the way this temple is built and managed..

Name: jainms
Title: Good place to visit
Review: Very good architecture, good place and temple maintained well hygiene. one of the must visit place in Hyderabad.

Name: Sanjay Prakash
Title: Excellent temple
Review: I have visited this temple and the infrastructure is old and good. The ambiance is also breathtaking

Name: Jay Patel
Title: Great temple
Review: the infrastructure and other things are great, feels like you . really have stepped into a divine place.

Name: Srikant D
Title: Excellent place to relax
Review: A beautiful place , well maintained and organised. Located in Banjara Hills. The temple is built almost like a replica of Puri Jagannath temple.

Name: Saat A
Title: Lord Jagannath
Review: You don't have to go to Puri for seeing lord Jagannath. You can visit this temple this is just a replica of the lord here in Hyderabad.

Name: Y S N
Title: A lovely temple that's a feast for the senses
Review: Situated in Banjara Hills, this beautiful temple, though small, is a good replica of the original Puri Jagannath temple.Stories of Ramayana are beautifully etched on the walls and the temple is mostly clean and well maintained.Limited parking space, especially for cars is a big dampener.

Name: AshwanthPrathapani
Title: Very Good Temple
Review: This temple is a near replica of the famous Jagannadh temple in Puri. The temple is located in Banjara Hills and is easily accessible as it on the main road. It is well maintained and never so crowded. Best time to visit - early mornings and evenings.

Name: HARISH
Title: jai jagannath
Review: its like a jagannath temple in puri..best temple ,must visit...nice area and location..must attend aarti ..

Name: Rajesh Desai
Title: Very pious
Review: self visited temple and it is very pious , pleasant and nicely maintained. It is one the must visit location .

Name: balkivinod
Title: Chance to visit
Review: I had opportunity to visit the temple that is located in road number 12 banjara hills. It is well maintained and is clean compared to others. It is must visit and can get good darshan during weekdays as it is not much crowded.

Name: Debasis
Title: Serene
Review: This is a peaceful temple in the chaotic city Hyderabad.Very well designed, Prasadam available always.We visited and well spent time praying along with my family.Must see location.

Name: HONEY
Title: Best temple
Review: Jagannath temple is one of the best temple in the Hyderabad.The huge and massive infrastructure shown and the best place in the Hyderabad for peace.

Name: sivalenkasridhar
Title: Jai Jagannath
Review: Well maintained temple with utmost tranquility. You'll never  feel its in midst of busy roads. Should visit to experience the replicated structures as in Puri.

Name: Sindhuja Elupula
Title: peacefull world
Review: Good place to stay . Very good maintained. Very peace place and very good food. Very near to all picinic spot . thanks god sure i want visit this place with my family

Name: Abhishek p
Title: Narayani dham
Review: Good place to stay in loonava.Very good maintained.Very peace place and very good food.Very near to all picinic spot

Name: ShaanRoy
Title: Sunday evening gets crowded
Review: Parking is an issue on weekends. The temple is classy and so is the crowd. There is parking, shoe stands available. The temple is very clean and well maintained.

Name: Travellover6128
Title: Beautiful
Review: This temple is unique in design and simple in colour but wonderful to visit.  We were fortunate enough to visit with a local, who explain the history and customs, which made the trip more meaningful.

Name: Sundaresh
Title: A Pseudo  Puri Jaganath temple in Hyderabad
Review: Visiting this temple, makes you feel that you are in Puri and Orissa State. All preists from Orissa state and Rituals in Orissa style. A Prasadam is typical Puri temple style. There is a temple for Goddess Mahalakshmi and  Sun God.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: This temple is great and once we enter the temple we feel the inner  peace and calmness .People visit this more on Sundays

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: Shri Jagannath Temple - Hyderabad
Review: Jagannath Temple is located in Banjara Hills Hyderabad. It's beautiful construction. The temple resembles the Puri Jagannath Temple structure. But as it is new construction. It's so beautiful. Its so peaceful. You can see the reflection of the temple on the floor. When I visited it was a cool day. I really enjoyed the trip. It can be reached on a public transport or a city bus.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: good place
Review: This temple is famous and has got its own history.one of the best peaceful place to visit in hyderabad.

Name: Dr I R Patil
Title: Nice temple
Review: It has good architecture, small area, main God is Vishnu surrounding with small temples lot of locals visit, for tourists optional if you have time you can visit

Name: ganapathy d
Title: A must place to visit in ones life time
Review: The city of temples, architectural beauty, historical importance, loving citizens, ample of vegetarian food. What else you want in life

Name: BRL RAO
Title: Jagannadh Temple
Review: This temples replicas original Jagannadh Temple and situated the heart the city and worth seen. also welcomed maintained.

Name: crsarma
Title: Puri Jagannath----Deja Vous
Review: We were looking for a Marriage hall in hyderabad and visited Kalinga Function Hall. After finishing that activity saw a Gopuram of a temple. Went towards it and this was the Shri Jagannath Temple managed by the same trust managing the Marriage hall-Kalinga Cultural Trust.A grand temple almost a replica of Puri-Jagannath temple. Beautiful spick and span, peaceful and Grand Temple. The atmosphere here is very much conducive for meditation and prayer. The idols are awe inspiring.  Worth visiting daily. Good parking space  and temple provision store for all the paraphernalia required for performing Pooja(worship). Jai Jagannath-Jai Shri Krishna

Name: seshu n
Title: Very beautiful temple replica of main Poori temple
Review: Harathi is very good in this temple. you have to go in the evening 5 to attend the harathi..Here donations have to put in Hundi only.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Beautiful place
Review: Its a kind of Puri Jagannath temple replica with the main gopuram etc... Beautiful paintings on wall etx... Take time and visit

Name: S R V
Title: Lord Jagannath
Review: Te temple is worth visiting and the atmosphere is serene. The grand look and the calm prevailing here attracts all.

Name: vchu99
Title: A beautiful temple
Review: This is a replica.  You need to take off the shoes, like most other temples in India.  It has granite floors. The feeling of walking on the hot floor was great, and supposed to be good for the health.

Name: GoWrong
Title: Bliss
Review: This was my place to relax in Hyderabad. I love the vibes of this places.. very positive and peaceful. May be its owing to the nice locality of jubilee hills which is not very crowded.

Name: AAB-PNE
Title: Wonderfully crafted temple, calm and serene environment
Review: Temple is located at Banjara Hills.Temple is beautifully built and is near replica of Puri temple.All around the temple, murals depicting events are created.Great time to spend an hour or so in calmness.

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Calm and serene.
Review: This is a very peaceful location. And quite attractive. And the place is well maintained and tidy. Nice experience.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Shri Jagannath Temple
Review: The Shri Jagannath temple in Hyderabad has been built as a replica of the famous Jagannath temple of Puri in Orissa. The temple is well maintained and we had a very satisfying darshan of Lord Jagannath here

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Calm & Peace
Review: Looking for a silent divine space, here it is. It is awesome decorate and has very good positive vibe.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: It is the best temple in Hyderabad. It remains closed for some duration in the afternoon. Shoe stands are there outside. The temple is beautiful from inside and outside.

Name: mactejas
Title: Serene Temple in midst of busy juncture
Review: This temple is located at Banjara hills beside TRS Party office, the roads leading to this temple is always busy and with traffic honks and all other chaos, but once you step inside the temple, you will be in a serene and calm place. You will have a calmness inside and it resonates inside. Do visit this temple if you are a localite. Other travelers who are not outsiders can visit this temple if you like to visit temples.

Name: thakurkunalsingh73
Title: Paradise in Hyderabad
Review: One of the beautifullly built , excellently designed and the most spiritual place in Hyderabad are the perfect words for this temple... This temple looks exactly like the original one and evening is the best time to visit this place...

Name: Prada
Title: Be at Ease Spiritually
Review: Hyderabad is surely a must visit place if you are Spiritually Inclined and yet enjoy good food and good life. Temple visits should be a MUST.

Name: ShashankOkhde
Title: Beautiful and silent temple
Review: Really beautiful temple, a near replica of Jagannath Temple in Puri. Always feels very peaceful visiting here. Sometimes on special days, the place can get crowded.

Name: Alok B
Title: Well built temple.
Review: Temple is well built, the management needs to take more care of the devotees. Apart from it everything was really good.

Name: Arunkumar
Title: one can get peaceful mind in the chaos
Review: The temple is very attractive with its attractive art and culture. very peaceful temple with great  Architecture. one of the best temple to visit in Hyderabad.

Name: k7591
Title: Serenity midst chaos
Review: Feels serene and divine.This temple has a feel of original puri temple.nice and wide space but many steps to climb.Difficult for physically imprecated people to access temple.

Name: sailaja2015
Title: Looks exactly like the original Puri Jagannath temple
Review: It’s a beautiful replica of the origyinal Puri Jagannath Temple. Very well maintained. There’s a certain and calm and peace about this temple. Not much crowds during weekdays, so you can spend time seeing the Temple and the mythological depictions on the compound walls. We sat down for a while and just absorbed the peaceful atmosphere. It’s very neatly maintained. Must visit if you’re in Hyderabad.

Name: sunilpadmanabhuni
Title: Nice temple
Review: Nice replica of Jagannath temple. The idols are so pleasant, I like this place and the sweets they sell are bit expensive

Name: vamsheekris
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: This is my favourite and regular temple in the banjara hills area. Pleasant atmosphere all the time.

Name: KapilSaraswat
Title: A Birthday Visit
Review: I think it is a must see place in the Hyderabad. Peaceful and inspiring place.Located in the Central location in Hyderabad and it gives you the feeling that you are in Puri.

Name: tamizh1974
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Nice, but crowdy, no peace. Also on Sunday there was Saraswati Devi Pooja because of which more crowd.
